#summary PIE Function : Make

= PIE Function : Make=

Make is used to assign a name to a value. This is known as a variable, because the value can vary while the program runs.

Once you have assigned a name using make you can refer to it elsewhere in the program.

== Example ==


<font color = "blue">make</font> bob 

<font color = "blue">set</font> bob <font color = "blue">to</font> 1

<font color = "brown">add</font> 9 <font color = "blue">to</font> bob
